definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: ebony (so Symm Vulgate Ki & moderns; otherwise LXX SyrVer; Egypt. heben, Lieblein:ÄZ 1886, 13 cf. Pinsker:Einleitung 83; Gk. e)/be/ov, Lat. hebenum)—only pl. [[הָבְנִים]] Ez Eze 27:15 Qr (Kt [[הובנים]]) [[קַרְנוֹת שֵׁן והבנים]]; it was brought fr. India, & (finer) fr. Ethiopia, cf. Sm & reff.
